title: Automatic Generation of @importFrom Tags
text: importing functions use package, choice @import pkg import whole package @importFrom pkg fun1 fun2 import functions. @importFrom syntax preferable, stressed importing whole packages “makes code harder read (can’t tell function coming ), @import many packages, increases chances function name conflicts.” R Packages (2e) guidelines say two reasonable locations @importFrom : close possible usage external function. mindset, place @importFrom roxygen comment function package use external function. central location. approach keeps @importFrom tags together, dedicated section package-level documentation file (can created usethis::use_package_doc()). find first option much clearer, , warn, tends get tedious keep track function calls. Therefore, autoimport parse code, detect functions import, add right @importFrom tags right place. Just like !

title: Automatic Generation of @importFrom Tags
text: autoimport guess potential source functions based (1) packages currently loaded environment (e.g. via library()), (2) packages listed dependencies DESCRIPTION. load_all(".") required autoimport access package’s private functions, example dplyr::filter() mask yourpackage:::filter(). package guesses bound wrong, case use usethis::use_import_from(). See “Limitations” details.

title: Automatic Generation of @importFrom Tags
text: Autoimport based utils::getSrcref() share limits. Therefore, function syntaxes recognized autoimport try remove @importFrom individual functions: Operators (@importFrom dplyr %>%, @importFrom rlang :=, …) Functions called name (e.g. sapply(x, my_fun)) Functions used inside strings (e.g. glue("my_fun={my_fun(x)}")) keep imported, either use prefix (pkg::my_fun) import package-level documentation, file ignored default (due ignore_package=TRUE). , usethis::use_import_from() usethis::use_pipe() friends! Also, note R6 methods calls trigger “found” warning (WIP, see #21).

title: Automatic Generation of @importFrom Tags
text: running autoimport() large package can take time, cache system implemented, default file inst/autoimport_cache.rds. function modified since last run taken cache, resulting much faster run. seldom cases, can cause issues modifications DESCRIPTION IMPORTLIST taken account. Run clean_cache() remove file, use use_cache="write".

title: Automatic Generation of @importFrom Tags

title: Automatically compute @importFrom tags — autoimport
text: root Path root package. ... unused location Whether add @importFrom dispatched function, centralized package level. files Files read. Can "read" "write". ignore_package Whether ignore files ending -package.R verbose higher, output printed. May slow process bit.
